title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Broadcasting (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 14 July 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited broadcasting (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2021 (2) order come operation 14 july 2021

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

(2) References to the Department of Transport contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (2) reference department transport contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Transport by or under
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Transport by or under 
subsections (1) and (5) of section 128 of the Broadcasting Act 2009 (No. 18 of 
2009) are transferred to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media. 

(2) References to the Minister for Transport contained in any Act or 
instrument made under an Act and relating to any functions transferred by this 
Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references 
to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister transport subsection (1) (5) section 128 broadcasting act 2009 (no 18 2009) transferred minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (2) reference minister transport contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Transport is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, the name of 
the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media shall, in so 
far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be 
substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Transport or added in 
the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister transport party proceeding reference function transferred order minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium name minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister transport added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Transport may, in so far as it relates to a

“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th July, 2021.

function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts,

and Media.

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Transport contained in the memorandum
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Transport contained in the memorandum 
and articles of association of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, 
Sport and Media. 

the functions
text_norm: 7 reference minister transport contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium function

title: instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Transport in connection 
the 
with 
commencement to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or 
assignment - 

this Order are

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media by this Article, which, on 
the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Transport shall, on the request of the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media.
